entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui should default PublishReadyToRun true on Windows Release #6025
  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI - Resubmission #6024
  • RC1 Compilation failed to complete #6022
  • 'UIApplication.Windows' is unsupported on: 'ios' 15.0 and later #6020
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Visual State Manager Ignored in CollectionView #6019
  • SwipeView custom items are not rendering #6018
  • Maui Blazor App (new template) will not build for iOS after update to latest VS Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 #6017
  • SwipeView Threshold changes width and offset of the side menu (when visible) #6016
  • FilePicker doesn't take into account IsExternalStorageManager #6015
  • Documentation - add advanced sample for every control and also screenshots for this sample #6011
  • Blazor Hybrid: Cannot resolve type for @page from Razor Class Library #6010
  • StackLayout.IsEnabled = FALSE does not Disable the Child Components within it #6008
  • Some control styling doesn't reflect UserAppTheme #6006
  • Remaining Todo items in Android WebKitWebViewClient #6002
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Include an option to add a menu item separator. Sometimes menu items need to be logically grouped. #5999
  • Publish MAUI app with project reference to class library net6.0 - cause erorrs #5993
  • Editor AutoSize on Text Change Surpass the border around it #5991
  • After navigating back, button command is not responding to click #5987
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on hybrid Android apps #5986

Closed

  • [Help] Cannot build project on RC1 #6021
  • Access modifier of ShareImplementation and PreferencesImplementation is set to Internal, Check for others too #6007
  • OnAppearing firing twice when using Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #5877
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BottomTabs on Android shell is currently recreating the Page Handler with each navigation #5615
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] Shell back button toggle not working #5643
    6.0.300
  • BlazorWebView API review: WPF #5910
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: WinForms #5909
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: Windows #5906
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • LinearGradientBrush crashes app on launch on iOS #5812
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Recreating the Handler for a Page causes the GestureManager to remain disconnected #5594
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Desktop API review #2539
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Editor Size does not change on iOS #5990
  • BlazorWebView API review: Android #5907
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Exception when using Editor with WidthRequest inside horizontal StackLayout #5749
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView API review: iOS/macCatalyst #5908
    6.0.300-rc.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Create Flyout.Details inside Fragment #6023
  • Update ASP.NET Core Packages to 6.0.4 And Remove Coherent Dependency #6014
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
  • Add public api analyzer to Maui.Core #6003
  • [iOS] Add vertical text alignment to Editor #5996
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Correctly render Shape Background (and BackgroundColor) #5994
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:

Merged

  • Don't destroy fragments when switching tabs #6005
  • Keep the text wrapping/truncation and max lines stuff in Controls #5936
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix typo in XML doc #6001
  • WinForms/WPF/MAUI-Windows API review changes #5998
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [android] Update to latest AndroidX packages with better Trimmable support. #5889
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add pending changes in Alerts (RTL, Keyboard) #5739
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [iOS] Fix crashing converting GradientPaint to GradientBrush #5997
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, fatal
  • Blazor Hybrid Android API Changes #5988
  • Use SizeToFit when measuring Editor on iOS with infinite constraints #5981
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Remove downcasts in BlazorWebView #5984
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    area/setup 🪄
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5979
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/publishing 🏁
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • BlazorWebView API review changes: Shared sources #5982
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Implement iOSPlatform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢
